title: Umm my account just got perma banned and i havent played on it for a month at least
body: Hi, can a riot member please help me with understanding how my account got banned, I haven't played on this account for over a month and I had trouble logging on the other day and you guys helped me with finding ways to fix it, I go to try them today and well the account been perma banned, why is that??? any chance I get my account back seeing as I haven't done anything wrong

replies.body: I had an account perma ban for calling myself trash during a match they wont help you.

No worries Rank Two! It looks like there was some suspicious looking activity going on, and someone might have possibly gained access to your account without you knowing. Hit up our account team using the [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and you should be back on the Rift in no time. ^_^
